title: Someone keeps trying to reset my password, should I be concerned?
body:
I haven't been playing for a while (a year or so), yet every other day I get an email saying someone has tried to reset my password. It's strange because my original login name is not common at all.

They don't have access to my email, but I'm still concerned. If I go a long time without logging in, is it possible this person might get my account changed since it looks like it's inactive and he/she lost access to my email or something?

replies.body: as long as your email is secure and your password is strong you will be fine
